recipe_instructions: 1. Wash and chop potatoes and sweet potatoes into bite-sized pieces. 2. Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. 3. Spread on a baking sheet and roast at 400°F (200°C) for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.
1. Cook ditalini pasta according to package directions. 2. While pasta cooks, heat butter in a pan. 3. Add cooked ditalini, salt, and pepper. Toss to combine.
1. Heat olive oil in a pan. 2. Sauté zucchini and mushrooms until tender. 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

extra_ingredients: olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder
recipe_instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 2. Chop tortillas into triangles. 3. Toss with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic powder. 4. Spread on baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes, or until crispy.
1. Rinse and chop cilantro and parsley. 2. Combine with a dollop of plain yogurt for a simple side dish.
